resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up
An activation code has been sent to your registered email. Please click on the link to reset your password.
Enter you email to reset your password
Upload a picture of yourself so other players around you can recognise you
Select the sports you\'re interested in!
We need to know a few more details so we can find you compatible teams
Your setup is complete. Let\'s get started!
I want other players to send me requests to join my team
Share team code with your teammates who want to join the team
Your team has successfully been created. \nAll the best!
